segments.text: I see the water overflowing and I feel a bit disgusted by the mess it's creating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn't seem to care, just standing there drying her dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, taking cookies without asking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how the boy is climbing on that stool, it's so unsafe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl, she's just waiting for her share, not a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the whole scene is just filled with bad behavior and mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to ruin the floor and cabinets if it keeps overflowing like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone cleans up this mess soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just not right, all this chaos and no one doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I need to look away, it's too much to take in.
segments.speaker: PAR
